intro: This section presents the entire 'The United Generations' project research led by Adalberto Lonardi during his MA Interior Design at the Royal College of Art (2020). From the preliminary two-years research about the critical role of the ageing population today, to the past and present of The Golden Lane Estate, to the architectural-visual design and delivery of a possible future for the communities of London.
